items.preText: Thanks, Liam. It should be a cruise from here
items.text: deflects this down to third man for an easy single
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: squared up by the length but carefully defended nonetheless.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: picks the length early, swivels back and pulls in front of square towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: too short, sitting up nicely outside off and he slaps this between midwicket and mid-on. Easy pickings. Picked the bones out of that
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: right behind the line as he defends this incoming length delivery
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: grip from length just around middle and off, he gets on top of the bounce and defends. Bounced over the stumps!
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: tossed up and drifting in from around the stumps, defended back.
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: eased down to long-on for a single, but hey, wait. He has over-stepped. Cardinal sin. Free-hit coming up
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: right in his swinging arc but he slices this lofted hit to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: too much flight, drills this straight to cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: eases this with the angle towards midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short and angling in towards middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: clears his front leg and eases this with the spin to long-off.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText:
How many more overs will these two take?

Naseef: "After mistaking Donald Tiripano for he-who-must-not-be-named I have done myself one better and read Tendai Chataraas "Tendulkar"!! Bless me again."
items.text: steers this length delivery behind point for an easy single
items.shortText: Chatara to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: deflects this length delivery towards point, swift work by the man inside the ring by running to his left.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: this time, he plays the delicate little late cut towards third man who is square, so they jog back for the second. Mushfiqur ran right down the middle of the pitch but escaps the umpire's hawkeyes
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: slower length ball outside off, once again he opens the face of the bat to hit this very fine. Heavy dew so the ball just chugs along, the fielder can't stop despite a slide
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: eased behind point, looks for a single but is sent back
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: stands tall and defends back.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: drills the drive to cover.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: too short, he rocks back and slaps this into the wide long-on boundary. Within one more boundary of victory and a series win
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: skids one back in on a length, defended.
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: steps out and works this down to mid-on, he was already three steps outside the crease so completed the run very easily even though mid-on was inside the ring
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: nurdles this towards the man coming in from square leg
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: skids back in from outside off, defended back
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
